name: The Santa That Killed Christmas
description:
A 10 player co-operative platformer where you must deliver the presents to santa so that he can bring christmas. 

You play as a slave I mean elf who is task to reach Santa by going through the complex mechanism that is Santa's sweat shop I mean toy factory.

Controlls:

"E" Toggles between third and first person.

"P" or "ESC" to bring up the pause menu when in game.

As a host of a server use command propt and type "ipconfig" to get you IPv_4 address. This IP is what other people use to join your game. This game is Only Local multiplayer.

Requirments:

A huge lan party of friends that equal to the number of 10.
